resources.string: Museum Partner is meant to substitute the tools that was used previously for Audio Device in Most Museum. This Apps allow user to listen to audio by scanning the QR Code Available in the museum. Visitor area also able to View any releavant information provided by the Museum regarding the exhibit from the QR code taken. This apps is created by RC-Tech Team from Republic Polytechnic as their Final Year Project. Thank you for using this Apps.
Play next sound track on completed
Repeat playing when all sound track in the playlist has been played
Play sound track randomly, keep repeat after completion
Allow you to go back to previous exhibit when you start a new scan
Server URL where the QR Code Data located (Use Default)
